channel.title: BLACK MESA MULTIPLAYER (BMP)
channel.description:
i wrote it in steam discussions but it seems that crowbar collective are most likely to read it through here (ill just copy paste what i said to here)
the MP is very much like the original DM (maps and weapon obviously) and its nice. but i think there's few things that crowbar collective should change. *the game is not fast enough, while in the original DM you jumped and ran and moved very quickly in BMS_MP you move very slowly every time i jump i feel "fat" and climbing on ladders and etc. anyway the game needs to get faster IN EVERYTHING (including fire rate). *the FOV must get higher i know that some computers can't handle high FOV but still put that option its critical for me at least *put voice chat feature
besides all of thos i think the game is awesome and your'e awesome keep the good work (best MOD ever)
P.S. i found one bug that says "warning: overflowed CClientRenderablesList group 7"
